title: Saturday lecture: Medieval crime and violence
itunes:title: Saturday lecture: Medieval crime and violence
itunes:subtitle: Hannah Skoda explores the nature and consequences of crime and violence in the middle ages. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the first of five talks from our virtual Medieval Life and Death Day event, historian Hannah Skoda explores the nature and consequences of crime and violence in the middle ages. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
